Subjects taught at the department of ADT

№ Fan nomi Brief information about science
Bachelor iat
  Basics of programming The purpose of teaching the subject is to adequately teach students the basics of programming, to teach them to implement software for applied problems of computer modeling based on this knowledge, and to provide basic knowledge in the study of special disciplines, optimal solutions to problems. finding and imparting skills and competencies.
  Algorithmic languages ​​and programming The basics of creating a computer program that solves a problem in science are taught. Structural and object-oriented programming principles are considered in the C # programming language.
  Algorithms and data structure Information about algorithms and data structures is given, in particular, linear and nonlinear data structures, sorting and search algorithms, elements of graph theory are studied. Students will be taught the skills of finding optimal solutions for solving practical problems, using them in the creation of software products.
  Database The purpose of teaching science is to teach methods of designing and modeling databases. Analyze arbitrary objects based on the acquired knowledge and teach to model the data in a special Toad Data Modeler environment. Have the basic knowledge to create database systems. Teach database design and modeling techniques. Analyze arbitrary objects based on the acquired knowledge and teach to model the data in a special Toad Data Modeler environment.
  Multimedia technologies The main purpose of the subject "Multimedia Technologies" is to teach students the mathematical and algorithmic bases of computer graphics, the creation of multimedia products through multimedia tools and technologies. For this purpose, basic concepts about the programs and technologies used in the creation of multimedia products are given and taught to use them.
  System programming The purpose of the science is to provide students with theoretical knowledge of translation methods, installation of file systems, loaders and networking, practical training in the creation of system programming tools and the application of this knowledge in solving practical problems. The main task of science is to master the general principles of system software organization, the basics of compilers, the creation of system utilities and interpreters, the formation of knowledge on assemblers, loaders, compilers, macro definitions and the principles of their implementation.
  Programming technologies Programming Technology is one of the major undergraduate disciplines. The main goal of this subject is to teach students to create a computer program that solves a problem using programming environment technologies. For this purpose, basic concepts about programming languages, environments and technologies are given and taught to use. Science teaches the application of modern programming languages ​​and technologies such as Visual C ++, Visual C #, Java, Windows Forms, WPF, LINQ, Java Servlet / JSP.
  Methods of teaching computer science The purpose of teaching science is the most difficult part of practical methodology. The purpose of teaching is considered in the unity of education, upbringing and development in general didactics. Informatics also takes into account the practical aspect - preparing a young person for life in a computerized society. The practical component of education is manifested in the knowledge of the practical benefits of communication with the computer (queries to search engines, the Internet, small calculations, etc.). It determines the quality and level of life.
  WEB technologies Theoretical foundations of Web technologies, the state of development of modern web technologies, their role in the operation of Internet / Intranet computer networks, directions and problems of web technologies, tools and methods of design automation, knowledge of building complex web applications. The task of science is to create complex web applications that are user-friendly using modern web technologies, to provide skills in using various tool tools for creating web applications.
  Python programming language Objectives of science - to study the algorithmic basis of problem solving, the principle of computer operation, classification of programming languages, description of data and commands on the computer, programming using various technologies in Python, object-oriented programming, working in a visual programming environment. functions.
  Problem solving in Python programming language The main goal of the course "Solving problems in the Python programming language" is to teach students the Python programming language, to teach them to implement software for computer modeling problems based on this knowledge, and to provide basic knowledge in the specialty. lish.
  Creating computer games The main purpose of the subject "Creating computer games" is to teach students to create games with different functions for the computer on the basis of Unity.
  Intelligent systems The purpose of teaching this subject is to study ways to solve difficult formal problems in various fields of application. It is proposed to use the theory of image comprehension and algorithms, as well as methods of artificial intelligence in finding solutions to problems in these areas. 
  Creating mobile applications The role and importance of mobile devices and software in them, mobile devices operating system, its architecture, structure, operating principles, services, the ability to create applications compatible with the Android operating system using the modern programming language JAVA, events and processes in applications management, creating and customizing the user interface when creating applications, various services on mobile devices (messaging, device management, working with databases, etc.).
  Machine learning methods The purpose of teaching the subject is to provide students with knowledge about the mathematical foundations and algorithms of machine learning, methods of analysis, organization of combinations of methods, the creation of modern information systems and software for solving and applying practical problems 'lish.
  Standardization of information technologies Teaching students the standardization of information technology at the national and international levels
Judiciary
1 SQL technologies The purpose of science teaching is to study the technology and methods of creating local, distributed and object-relational databases using structured language queries and SQL dynamic interface. The task of the science is to help graduates to master the theoretical foundations of SQL technologies, to develop practical skills in the design and management of databases using SQL technologies.
2 Design of information systems The purpose and task of science is to create complex information systems and train specialists in the field of their life cycle management; mastering basic structural concepts, international standards and practices; shaping a systematic approach to creating complex systems; is to build the ability to shape the future prospects of a systematic approach to creating complex projects.
3 Intellectual analysis of data The purpose of the subject is to teach students the basics of data storage, the basics of intellectual analysis of data, modern mathematical methods of understanding symbols to solve practical problems qualitatively and accurately, and explain the process of developing and making modern information systems to solve complex formal problems. The task of science is to impart knowledge and skills to build information models for solving complex formalized problems using artificial intelligence methods in the form of computational experiments.  
4 Theory of machine learning      The purpose of science teaching is to create a basis for the application of modern methods of machine learning and to develop in graduate students the ability to analyze the problems of machine learning and to choose this or that solution at a discount. The task of the science is to study and analyze the modern formulation of the problem of machine learning, different models of machine learning: linear models, solution tree, neural networks, online problems of machine learning and teacherless problems.  
5 Programming for artificial intelligence issues The purpose of teaching science is to teach graduate students the use of programming languages ​​and scientific libraries to solve problems in the field of artificial intelligence, as well as to analyze the problems of machine learning. The task of the science is to conduct programming and analysis of programming and computational experiments using programming language and artificial intelligence technologies for machine learning problems.  

The disciplines taught at the department are for master's degree.
